languages.text: "Я рад, что наши пути пересеклись вновь, дитя. Для меня облегчение знать, что ты жива. Но... что это?" {n}Провидец хмурится, и беспокойство отражается на его бледном лице.{/n} "Твоя душа плутает впотьмах, опутанная порослью недопустимой связи. Я вижу, что она произрастает из семян одиночества, сомнений и страха. И нить судьбы натянута меж тобой и..." {n}, — хлесткий взгляд устремляется к вам, —{/n} "Мон-кай".

"I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что наши пути пересеклись вновь, дитя. Для меня облегчение знать, что ты жива. Но... что это?" {n}Провидец хмурится, и беспокойство отражается на его бледном лице.{/n} "Твоя душа плутает впотьмах, опутанная порослью недопустимой связи. Я вижу, что она произрастает из семян одиночества, сомнений и страха. И нить судьбы натянута меж тобой и..." {n}, — хлесткий взгляд устремляется к вам, —{/n} "Мон-кай".

languages.text: «Me alegro de que nuestros caminos hayan vuelto a cruzarse, hija mía. Supone para mí un gran alivio saber que estás viva. Pero... ¿qué es esto?». {n}El vidente frunce el ceño, y su rostro exhibe preocupación.{/n} «Tu alma vaga en la penumbra, atrapada en la maraña de un vínculo despreciable que ha germinado de las semillas de la soledad, la duda y el miedo. Y veo que este hilo del destino te une a...». {n}Su penetrante mirada vuela hacia ti.{/n} «{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de que nuestros caminos hayan vuelto a cruzarse, hija mía. Supone para mí un gran alivio saber que estás viva. Pero... ¿qué es esto?». {n}El vidente frunce el ceño, y su rostro exhibe preocupación.{/n} «Tu alma vaga en la penumbra, atrapada en la maraña de un vínculo despreciable que ha germinado de las semillas de la soledad, la duda y el miedo. Y veo que este hilo del destino te une a...». {n}Su penetrante mirada vuela hacia ti.{/n} «{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「我々の道が再び交わったことを嬉しく思うぞ、我が子よ。君が生きていたと知って、私は大いに安堵している。だが…これは何だ？」{n}先見司は顔をしかめ、不安げな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「君の魂は闇の中をさまよい、卑しむべきつながりの茂みに絡め取られている。それは孤独、疑念、恐怖の種から育ったものだろう。そしてこの運命の糸が結んでいるのは、君と…」{n}鋭い視線があなたに注がれる。{/n} 「モン＝ケイだ」
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: 「我々の道が再び交わったことを嬉しく思うぞ、我が子よ。君が生きていたと知って、私は大いに安堵している。だが…これは何だ？」{n}先見司は顔をしかめ、不安げな表情を浮かべた。{/n}「君の魂は闇の中をさまよい、卑しむべきつながりの茂みに絡め取られている。それは孤独、疑念、恐怖の種から育ったものだろう。そしてこの運命の糸が結んでいるのは、君と…」{n}鋭い視線があなたに注がれる。{/n} 「モン＝ケイだ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我很高兴我们又相遇了，我的孩子。得知你还活着，我真是松了口气。但……这是怎么回事？”{n}先知皱起眉头，脸上流露出忧虑的神色。{/n}“你的灵魂在黑暗中徘徊，被某种卑劣的关系所缠绕。我看到它正从孤独、怀疑与恐惧的种子中不断生长。这条命运的丝线将你和……”{n}他将锐利的目光投向你。{/n}“一只猴子联系在一起。”
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴我们又相遇了，我的孩子。得知你还活着，我真是松了口气。但……这是怎么回事？”{n}先知皱起眉头，脸上流露出忧虑的神色。{/n}“你的灵魂在黑暗中徘徊，被某种卑劣的关系所缠绕。我看到它正从孤独、怀疑与恐惧的种子中不断生长。这条命运的丝线将你和……”{n}他将锐利的目光投向你。{/n}“一只猴子联系在一起。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Je suis heureux que nos chemins se croisent à nouveau, mon enfant. Quel soulagement d'apprendre que vous êtes toujours en vie ! Mais... qu'est-ce que ceci ? » {n}Le Grand Prophète fronce les sourcils et semble soudain inquiet.{/n} « Votre âme erre dans la pénombre, empêtrée dans les broussailles d'une misérable relation. Je vois qu'elle est née de la solitude, du doute, de la peur. Et ce fil du destin s'étend entre vous et... {n}Son regard aiguisé se tourne vers vous.{/n} {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis heureux que nos chemins se croisent à nouveau, mon enfant. Quel soulagement d'apprendre que vous êtes toujours en vie ! Mais... qu'est-ce que ceci ? » {n}Le Grand Prophète fronce les sourcils et semble soudain inquiet.{/n} « Votre âme erre dans la pénombre, empêtrée dans les broussailles d'une misérable relation. Je vois qu'elle est née de la solitude, du doute, de la peur. Et ce fil du destin s'étend entre vous et... {n}Son regard aiguisé se tourne vers vous.{/n} {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass sich unsere Wege erneut kreuzen, mein Kind. Welch Erleichterung, dass Ihr noch lebt. Aber ... was ist das?" {n}Der Runenprophet runzelt die Stirn und schaut dabei besorgt aus.{/n} "Eure Seele wandert im Zwielicht und ist eine schändliche Verbindung eingegangen, in der sie sich verstrickt hat. Ich sehe, dass diese Verbindung aus dem Samen der Einsamkeit, der Zweifel und der Ängste erwächst. Und dieser Faden des Schicksals verbindet uns ..." {n}Sein scharfer Blick eilt zu dir.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass sich unsere Wege erneut kreuzen, mein Kind. Welch Erleichterung, dass Ihr noch lebt. Aber ... was ist das?" {n}Der Runenprophet runzelt die Stirn und schaut dabei besorgt aus.{/n} "Eure Seele wandert im Zwielicht und ist eine schändliche Verbindung eingegangen, in der sie sich verstrickt hat. Ich sehe, dass diese Verbindung aus dem Samen der Einsamkeit, der Zweifel und der Ängste erwächst. Und dieser Faden des Schicksals verbindet uns ..." {n}Sein scharfer Blick eilt zu dir.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Yollarımızın bir kez daha kesişmesinden memnunum çocuğum. Hayatta olduğunu bilmek, içimi bir hayli ferahlatıyor. Fakat... Bu nedir?" {n}Ötesezen, kaşlarını çatıyor. Yüzünde bir endişe ifadesi beliriyor.{/n} "Ruhun kasvet içinde dolaşıp duruyor. Hakir bir bağın sarmaşıklarına dolanmış. Görüyorum ki yalnızlık, kuşku ve korku tohumlarıyla hayat bulmuş. Kaderin bu ipi, seni bir..." {n}Keskin bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh'e bağlıyor."
languages.original_text: "I am glad our paths have crossed again, my child. It is a great relief for me to know you are alive. But... what is this?" {n}The Farseer frowns, and concern surfaces on his face.{/n} "Your soul wanders in the gloom, entangled in the brush of a despicable connection. I see that it grows from the seeds of solitude, doubts, and fears. And this thread of fate stretches between you and..." {n}His keen gaze darts to you.{/n} "A mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: "Yollarımızın bir kez daha kesişmesinden memnunum çocuğum. Hayatta olduğunu bilmek, içimi bir hayli ferahlatıyor. Ama... Bu nedir?" {n}Ötesezen, kaşlarını çatıyor. Yüzünde bir endişe ifadesi beliriyor.{/n} "Ruhun, kasvet içinde dolaşıp duruyor. Hakir bir bağın sarmaşıklarına dolanmış. Görüyorum ki ona yalnızlık, kuşku ve korku tohumları hayat vermiş. Kaderin bu ipiyse, senden başlayıp bir..." {n}Keskin bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Mon-keigh'e ulaşıyor."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
